column3: Hi @yakitorifoodie, nice to see you contributing for the first time! Pinging you on the squash [requested above](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19009#pullrequestreview-418267181). You'll need to do that before this can be merged.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
No conflicts as of last run.

@yakitorifoodie - let me know if you'd like a hand with [squashing your commits]( https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#squashing-commits). I'm ajonas on IRC or you can email me at jonas at chaincode.com if you want to talk through it.
Are you still working on this. Otherwise I suggest closing "Up for grabs"
This can be re-opened if needed.
Maybe extract this as a constant that is set to `10` when nCheckDepth is less than 1000 blocks and to `1` otherwise?
Perhaps place the explanatory comment of `// report every 10% step if nCheckDepth is <= 1000 blocks else report every 1% step` here where you initialize `log_step`.
